verses.verse: From: Peter, a missionary of Jesus, the Anointed King. To: Select refugees of a scattering throughout Pontus, Galatia, Cappadocia, Western Turkey, and Bithynia
in line with what Father God knew beforehand in the sacredness of the Spirit for obedience and the sprinkling of the blood of Jesus, the Anointed King. May generosity to you and peace increase.

The God and Father of our Master Jesus, the Anointed King, is conferred with prosperity, the One who in line with His great forgiving kindness gave birth to us again for good anticipation that lives through Jesus, the Anointed King's, return back to life from the dead,
for an inheritance undeteriorating, undesecrated, and not snuffed out, that has been kept in heavens for you,
the people in God's ability being watched over through trust, for rescue, ready to be uncovered in the last time,
in which you are a little excited now, though it is a thing that is necessary after being sad in various troubles

so that the proving of your trust (much more valuable than the gold that is ruined, but proved, through fire) might be found for high praise, value, and magnificence during the uncovering of Jesus, the Anointed King,
whom, though you did not see, you love, for whom, not seeing now, but trusting, you are excited with happiness, inexpressible and that has been made magnificent,
retrieving the conclusion of your trust, a rescue of souls,
about which rescue, the preachers who preached about the generosity for you, searched out and checked out,

checking for whom or which time the Spirit in them of the Anointed King was making obvious, as He witnessed beforehand about the hardships for the Anointed King and the magnificent things after these,

to whom it was uncovered that they were serving these things, not to themselves, but to us, things that now were announced to you through the people who shared good news with you in the Sacred Spirit that was sent out from heaven, things that announcers desire to stoop and peer into.
For this reason, after tying up the waists of your mind, being completely sober, anticipate good based on the generosity brought to you during the uncovering of Jesus, the Anointed King.
As children of obedience, not conforming to the prior desires in your lack of awareness,
but, in line with the Sacred One who invited you, you yourselves also must become sacred in every behavior
because it has been written, (in Leviticus 11:44) "Become sacred because I am sacred."
And if you call on the Father who without showing favoritism judges according to the work of each person, turn over the time of your foreign residency in fear,
realizing that not with deteriorating things (silver or gold) a price was paid to release you from your futile behavior (the traditional behavior of the forefathers),
but with valuable blood (as of a lamb unblemished and unspotted) of the Anointed King,
who certainly had been known beforehand, before the founding of the world, but who was shown over the last times because of you,
the ones who through Him trust in God, the One who got Him up from the dead and gave Him magnificence in such a way for your trust and anticipation to be in God.
Having consecrated your souls in the obedience of the truth through the Spirit to brotherly kindness that is not faked, from a clean heart, love each other intensively
being born again, not from a deteriorating seed distribution, but from an undeteriorating seed distribution through God's living and remaining message for the span of time,
because every physical body is as grass and all the magnificence of a person, as a flower of grass. The grass shriveled up, and its flower fell off,
but the statement of the Master remains for the span of time. This is the statement, the statement of good news that was shared to you.
